Visa are required for all visitors with the exception of nationals from the following 33 countries:

If you reside in the UAE and wish to apply for visas for family, relatives or friends, Air Arabia is pleased to assist. We extend visa assistance services for visitors from any one of our destinations, so all what it takes is a return ticket.

If you reside in the UAE and wish to apply for visas for family, relatives or friends, Air Arabia is pleased to assist. We extend visa assistance services for visitors from any one of our destinations, so all what it takes is a return ticket.
Dubai & Sharjah Immigration Tourist Visa for Immediate Family Members , Friends & relatives
Passport copy & residence visa with minimum of 3 months validity
Last 3 month bank statement stamped by the bank OR Latest Salary certificate + tenancy contract with minimum 3 month validity
2 clear visitor passport copy with minimum validity of six months
Children with separate passports will require individual visa
For children under the age of 10 years, the guarantee deposit cheque of AED 7,500/- is required
GCC Nationals (Gulf Cooperation Council member countries): Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar and Saudi Arabia.
The bearer of the visit visa is not allowed to work in the UAE
An overstay charge of AED 200 will be charged per person on the first day and additional AED 100 for every additional day of over-stay.

Western Europe: France, Italy, Germany, Holland, Belgium, Luxemburg, Switzerland, Austria, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Portugal, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Spain, Monaco, Vatican City, Iceland, Andorra, San Mario and Liechtenstein.
Far East: Japan, Brunei, Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong
Visitors must enter the UAE within 2 months from date of issue of the visa
Only single entry is allowed. Once the visitor departs from UAE, the visa will be automatically cancelled
Re-entry into the UAE is permitted after 30 days of exit
Cancellation of visa that is approved and not used can take place only after the visit visa expires (60 days) from the date of issue.
Applicant must pay AED 175 for cancellation charges then the visa will be cancelled (note visa charges cannot be refunded if visa was rejected, cancelled or approved)
If visa is under process and needs to be cancelled then the applicant must pay AED 175. This requires 5-6 days from date of applying the cancellation.
A Tourist visa is valid for 30 days from the time of entry into the UAE and can be extended for another 30 days before its expiry
Request for extension of visa must be made at least 10 days before expiry of the visa
Incase of Extending the visa, medical insurance must be renewed at a charge of AED 50
Original passport is required along with original visa and payment of AED 870 for Dubai or Sharjah visa /

Although we always encourage our passengers to take advantage of our easy-to-use online facilities while booking their flights, we are also a phone call away at any time of day.
We have dedicated call centres available throughout our entire network to assist you with your booking as well as inform you about Air Arabia and our fabulous services and offers.
Select the country of your residence and call the number shown below. Our trained call centre agents will be there to assist you.
No matter where you are located, we are always there for you.

Although we always encourage you to book online, you are always welcome to visit any of our sales centres near your area. We have sales centres that cover our entire network. For advice on securing cheap flights, air travel discounts and the best travel deals, our agents are always available to help you.
Select the town of your residence and view telephone numbers and locations of our sales centres in your country.
Just call or visit us and we will take care of the rest!

Travelling without insurance? Before you decide, we recommend you consider some key facts.
No, I do not want to purchase insurance
1. Did you know that Travel Secure is one of the most affordable and easiest ways to protect your trip from unexpected events such as accidents or flight delays?
2. Did you know that even though most credit cards include insurance, the cover they offer is often limited?
3. Travel Secure is the most comprehensive travel insurance you can buy and provides you with complete piece of mind.
Yes, I wish to purchase insurance
Any trip is incomplete without travel insurance...

Whether you\'re on a holiday or business trip, we want you to have a trip with peace of mind. Let us be the one to worry about your medical, emergency and travel inconvenience and all you need to do is purchase TUNE PROTECT PLATINUM travel insurance plan.
per person, you will be covered for:
USD 50,000 for Accidental and Sickness Medical Reimbursement
USD 20,000 for Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation

Enjoy more personalized journey with Air Arabia. Select the meal of your choice offered by our Sky Cafe menu prior your flight.
To choose the meal/snack, select passenger name and desired meal/snack
To occupy an emergency seat a passenger must comply with the following conditions:
- Have full visual and auditory capability and be able to understand the cabin crew¿s instructions.
- Be in good health and be fully capacitated mentally and physically.
- Not have difficulty moving fast due to age, weight or bodily mass.
- Not be in custody or categorised as a deportee.

- Be willing to participate actively if required by opening the emergency door once instructed. In all circumstances, the company reserves the right, for operational or safety reasons, to assign or reassign seats at any time, even after aircraft boarding.For any incident that may arise in relation to Seat Selection, contact our Customer Service. Please note that the seats in the row number 11 do not recline for security reasons. I accept the terms and conditions for the emergency exit seat.

OK to Board: Passengers traveling from India, Pakistan or Bangladesh to UAE on a visit visa, tourist visa copy (not original) or an online visa must ensure an OK to Board message is updated against their ticket by the sponsor failing which they will not be accepted on Air Arabia.

The transaction was declined by your bank.

For security and privacy purposes, your bank doesn't provide Air Arabia with information about the reason of payment decline.
We advise you to take the following steps in order to resolve your payment issues:
1) Try to use another debit/credit card or another payment method to complete your purchase.
2) Check with your bank if your card is authorized to make online purchases. Most banks block some card types for online usage.
3) Check with your bank about their payment security policies. Your bank may flag any unexpected activity on your account (first time orders, high value purchases...).

Insufficient funds, transaction declined.

Your bank informed Air Arabia that your account doesn't have sufficient funds to cover for the cost of this transaction.
We advise you to take the following steps in order to resolve your payment issues:
1) Try to use another debit/credit card or another payment method to complete your purchase.
2) Check if you have enough funds in your account/card to cover the cost of the purchase.
3) Contact your bank and ask about daily withdrawal or purchase limits.

Authorization failed. The transaction was not successful and the amount was not deducted from your credit/debit card.

For security and privacy purposes, your bank doesn't provide Air Arabia with information about the reason of payment decline.
We advise you to take the following steps in order to resolve your payment issues:
1) Verify if you entered your payment information correctly on your purchase.
2) Try to use another debit/credit card or another payment method to complete your purchase.
3) Check with your bank about their payment security policies and the daily withdrawal or purchase limits.
We accept Moroccan cards. If you would like to pay with international card, please redo the booking in Euro currency.
We accept international cards. If you would like to pay with Moroccan card, please redo the booking in MAD currency.

These flights arrive into and depart from the Hajj Terminal. All passemgers including GCC nationals travelling for Umrah need to report to the Hajj Terminal in Jeddah for check-in. Saudi nationals / other visas cannot travel on this flight
